Retrieve ENSEMBL info file

Source: R/getENSEMBLInfo.R
getENSEMBLInfo.Rd

Retrieve species and genome information from http://rest.ensembl.org/info/species?content-type=application/json/.

getENSEMBLInfo()

Examples

info.file <- getENSEMBLInfo()
info.file
#> # A tibble: 199 x 10
#>    common_name name  assembly taxon_id accession strain_collecti… strain
#>    <chr>       <chr> <chr>    <chr>    <chr>     <chr>            <chr> 
#>  1 house mouse mus_… GRCm38   10090    GCA_0000… mouse            refer…
#>  2 human       homo… GRCh38   9606     GCA_0000… NA               NA    
#>  3 domestic g… cavi… Cavpor3… 10141    GCA_0001… NA               NA    
#>  4 house mouse mus_… CBA_J_v1 10090    GCA_0016… mouse            CBA/J 
#>  5 Midas cich… amph… Midas_v5 61819    GCA_0007… NA               NA    
#>  6 green anole anol… AnoCar2… 28377    GCA_0000… NA               NA    
#>  7 White-head… cebu… Cebus_i… 1737458  GCA_0016… NA               NA    
#>  8 ballan wra… labr… BallGen… 56723    GCA_9000… NA               NA    
#>  9 leopard     pant… PanPar1… 9691     GCA_0018… NA               NA    
#> 10 torafugu    taki… FUGU5    31033    GCA_0001… NA               NA
